snippet: Hundreds of works that the New York Public Library once considered too hot for the general reader to handle are now available to any adult with a library card.
abstract: New York Public Library unveils erotic materials collection as part of institute’s goal to thoroughly archive New York City life; collection, coded with three asterisks indicating that special permission is required for access, includes all types of erotica including massage parlor flyers, drawings of sexual acts, cards decorated with naked females, and gay and lesbian literature.
lead_paragraph: Hundreds of works that the New York Public Library once considered too hot for the general reader to handle are now available to any adult with a library card.

headline.main: Lifting the Veil on the New York Public Library’s Erotica Collection
headline.print_headline: Lifting the Veil on an Erotica Collection
